name: Latin America Tech Events Calendar
tagline: Help us improve the Tech Scene in Latin America
body:
The purpose of this repository is to organize a single page with the best Latin America Technology Events, and help spread the word.

# Events

## JSConf Colombia
**Location:** Colombia, Medellin  
**Date:** October, 18-19th  
**Website:** [JSConf Colombia](http://jsconf.co/)  

## StarTechConf Chile
**Location:** Chile, Santiago  
**Date:** October, 25-26th  
**Website:** [StarTechConf Chile](http://www.startechconf.com)  

## RubyConf Argentina
**Location:** Argentina, Buenos Aires  
**Date:** October, 27-28th  
**Website:** [RubyConf Argentina](http://rubyconfargentina.org/es/)  

# Support or Contact
Send me an email at heitor.sergent@sendgrid.com and I'll make sure to help out. :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
